TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAuthenticationModule

Docs.summary: 为 Web 客户端身份验证模块提供基本身份验证接口。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>接口定义自定义身份验证模块必须使用的属性和方法。
身份验证模块使用服务器执行整个身份验证过程, 并根据需要响应身份验证质询。 此过程可能包含与资源服务器分离的身份验证服务器的请求, 以及正确验证对 URI 的请求所需的任何其他活动。
自定义身份验证模块应<xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>实现接口, 然后向<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法注册。 身份验证模块也是通过读取配置文件在程序初始化时注册的。
## Examples 下面的示例通过实现<xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule>接口创建自定义身份验证类。 有关完整的示例, 请参阅<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Authorization Authenticate (string challenge, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.Authorization Authenticate(string challenge, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Function Authenticate (challenge As String, request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: System::Net::Authorization ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ challenge, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
abstract member Authenticate : string * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

Docs.param: 服务器发送的身份验证质询。
与质询关联的 实例。
Docs.summary: 返回 类的实例来响应来自服务器的身份验证要求。
Docs.returns: 一个 实例，包含有关请求的授权消息；如果无法处理质询，则包含 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法使用服务器执行身份验证过程, 并将<xref:System.Net.Authorization>实例返回到<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>。 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.Authenticate%2A>
## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.Authenticate%2A> 方法。 有关完整的示例, 请参阅<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#3)]

block.para: 在注册的身份验证模块上调用方法, 以确定处理质询的模块。 如果身份验证模块无法处理质询, 则该方法必须返回。 如果身份验证模块在执行身份验证过程中遇到错误, 则必须引发异常。

MemberSignature.Value: public string AuthenticationType { get; }
.property instance string AuthenticationType
Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationType As String
public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string

Docs.summary: 获取此身份验证模块提供的身份验证类型。
Docs.value: 指示此身份验证模块提供的身份验证类型的字符串。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A>属性标识此身份验证模块实现的身份验证类型。 方法使用<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Register%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定是否已<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.Unregister%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>注册身份验证模块, 并通过方法来删除已注册的身份验证模块。 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A>
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.AuthenticationType%2A> 属性。 有关完整的示例, 请参阅<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#7)]

.property instance bool CanPreAuthenticate
Public ReadOnly Property CanPreAuthenticate As Boolean
public: property bool CanPreAuthenticate { bool get(); };
member this.CanPreAuthenticate : bool

Docs.summary: 获取一个值，该值指示身份验证模块是否支持预身份验证。
Docs.value: 如果授权模块支持预身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 将属性设置为`true` , 以指示在调用<xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.PreAuthenticate%2A>方法时身份验证模块可以使用<xref:System.Net.Authorization>有效的实例进行响应。 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.CanPreAuthenticate%2A>
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.CanPreAuthenticate%2A> 属性。 有关完整的示例, 请参阅<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#7)]

block.para: 这通常是固定值;身份验证模块可以预身份验证或不能。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate (System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate(class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Function PreAuthenticate (request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization

abstract member PreAuthenticate : System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

Docs.param: 与身份验证请求关联的 实例。
与身份验证请求关联的凭据。
Docs.summary: 为对服务器的的身份验证请求返回 类的一个实例。
Docs.returns: 包含有关请求的授权消息的 实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当属性为`true`时, <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.PreAuthenticate%2A>方法将返回包含身份验证消息的<xref:System.Net.Authorization>类的实例。 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.CanPreAuthenticate%2A>
## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Net.IAuthenticationModule.PreAuthenticate%2A> 方法。 有关完整的示例, 请参阅<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#4)]
